solution_line_template: The number of the increase in chicken after {num_years} years is {annual_increase} * {num_years} = <<{annual_increase}*{num_years}={total_increase}>>{total_increase}.
So the total number of the chicken in Michael's farm will be {current_chickens} + {total_increase} = <<{current_chickens}+{total_increase}={final_chickens}>>{final_chickens}.
